author: Digital Foundry
description:
Digital Foundry is now fully independent - and it's YOUR support that makes shows like this possible. Join us at: https://bit.ly/3jEGjvx

The DF Retro Super Show is back, with John Linneman joined by his "posse" - Audi Sorlie, Marc 'Try4ce' Duddleson and Coury Carlson. The quartet deliver the latest retro gaming news before getting fully stuck into the main topic: why should you get into retro gaming? The team discuss their "journeys" into the realm of old games and consoles, share their favourites and much, much more.

Visit the NEW Digital Foundry website: https://www.digitalfoundry.net

Go here to check out DF merch! https://store.digitalfoundry.net

Subscribe for more Digital Foundry: http://bit.ly/DFSubscribe

00:00 - Introduction
02:09 - News 1: Vectrex Mini
07:13 - News 2: Changeable Guardian Esqtique
12:28 - News 3: New Square Enix CDs
16:15 - News 4: Zelda's Adventure CD-i Gets GBC Demake
19:45 - News 5: Infidelity Brings Contra Force to the SNES
23:25 - News 6: Sean Seanson'
title: DF Retro Super Show #003: Why Should You Get Into Retro Gaming?
